reviewText: Just love the DVD. Tells the story of the Greatest Generation's greatest college football team.

Wonderful! Great stories and one-liners. Well researched, chock full of videos and interviews. Notre Dame football history, yes, and well told, but also a wonderful salute to The Greatest Generation. A lot of fun to watch. Highly recommend.

What a wonderfully researched part of football history! I loved this DVD not only as an Irish fan - but as a history fan. This was the greatest team using so many veterans from the greatest generation.

A must for life-long Fighting Irish fans. I had only heard former players imitate Frank Leahy's voice prior to this video too. Shows how "our greatest generation" did after trading in their military uniform for a football jersey.
If you enjoy ND history this is a must!
I'm a huge Notre Dame fan, so this was very special to me.  I have followed ND since 1946.
